title: Spicy shepherd's pie
ingredients: ['1.3kg potatoes, peeled', 'salt to taste', 'drizzle of oil', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 to 5 medium onions, chopped', '4 garlic cloves, chopped', '4 green chillies, chopped', '675g lamb mince', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 teaspoon mixed dried herbs', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '180ml tomato passata', '1 teaspoon tomato puree', '225g sliced mushrooms', '225g sliced carrots', '300ml milk, warmed', '1 tablespoon butter', '300g grated mature Cheddar cheese']
